blocks.name: setsidel
blocks.content: The injected slot is an element of the structure with replacement. (Contributed by AV, 10-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm setsidel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, csts, cop(c0, c1)))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cop(c0, c1), c2, cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c0))), csn(cop(c0, c1))), w0)
  mp1i(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c0))), csn(cop(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  snid(cop(c0, c1))
  opex(c0, c1)
  elun2(cop(c0, c1), csn(cop(c0, c1)), cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c0))))
  syl5eq(c2, cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c0))), csn(cop(c0, c1))), co(c3, csts, cop(c0, c1)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c3, csts, cop(c0, c1)), cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c0))), csn(cop(c0, c1)))), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c1, c5))
  setsval(c3, c4, c1, c5, c0)
}

blocks.name: setsnidel
blocks.content: The injected slot is an element of the structure with replacement. (Contributed by AV, 10-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm setsnidel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, csts, cop(c7, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c7, c0))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cop(c0, c1), c2, cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), csn(cop(c7, c5))), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), csn(cop(c7, c5)))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7)))))
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7)))), wcel(c0, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), wcel(c0, universe), wne(c0, c7))
  elexd(c0, c8, w0)
  necomd(c0, c7, w0)
  eldifsn(c0, universe, c7)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7)))), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c3))), wcel(c1, c9))
  opelres(c1, c9, c0, c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7)))
  elun1(cop(c0, c1), cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), csn(cop(c7, c5)))
  syl5eq(c2, cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), csn(cop(c7, c5))), co(c3, csts, cop(c7, c5)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c3, csts, cop(c7, c5)), cun(cres(c3, cdif(universe, csn(c7))), csn(cop(c7, c5)))), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c6))
  setsval(c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm setsnidel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → < c0, c1 > ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ c2 =(c3[sSet]< c7, c5 >)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c9)
  ⊣ (w0 → < c0, c1 > ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ≠ c0)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(< c0, c1 >, c2, ((c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 }))⋃ { < c7, c5 > }), w0)
  syl(w0, < c0, c1 > ∈((c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 }))⋃ { < c7, c5 > }), < c0, c1 > ∈(c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 })))
  mpbir2and(w0, < c0, c1 > ∈(c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 })), c0 ∈(𝕌 \ { c7 }), < c0, c1 > ∈ c3)
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈(𝕌 \ { c7 }), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ≠ c7)
  elexd(c0, c8, w0)
  necomd(c0, c7, w0)
  eldifsn(c0, universe, c7)
  syl(w0, (< c0, c1 > ∈(c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 }))↔(c0 ∈(𝕌 \ { c7 })∧ < c0, c1 > ∈ c3)), c1 ∈ c9)
  opelres(c1, c9, c0, c3, (𝕌 \ { c7 }))
  elun1(< c0, c1 >, (c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 })), { < c7, c5 > })
  syl5eq(c2, ((c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 }))⋃ { < c7, c5 > }), (c3[sSet]< c7, c5 >), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c3[sSet]< c7, c5 >)=((c3 |`(𝕌 \ { c7 }))⋃ { < c7, c5 > }), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c6)
  setsval(c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)
}

blocks.name: setsv
blocks.content: The value of the structure replacement function is a set. (Contributed by AV, 10-Nov-2021.)
